messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] rice pasta ?
messages.msgSnippet: We too love brown rice pasta.  We use Tinkyada brand.  I have found that their pastas which are made with stone ground brown rice and rice brand hold up better
messages.messageBody:
We too love brown rice pasta. We use Tinkyada brand. I have found that their pastas which are made with stone ground brown rice and rice brand hold up better (less mushy) than their (or anyone's) rice pasta made with the flour only, no bran.

Annette
----- Original Message -----
From: Natrlmama@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, April 29, 2001 11:54 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] rice pasta ?


In a message dated 4/29/01 4:33:23 AM Pacific Daylight Time, lite2yu@...
writes:

<< Everyone in the family loves brown rice pasta >>

What brand is this? TIa

Kathy
